original_title: Strikeforce Heavyweight Grand Prix Finals: Barnett vs. Cormier
overview: Strikeforce Heavyweight Grand Prix Finals: Barnett vs. Cormier (aka Strikeforce: Barnett vs. Cormier)  was a mixed martial arts event held by Strikeforce that served as the Heavyweight Tournament Finals. It took place on May 19, 2012 at the HP Pavilion in San Jose, California.
title: Strikeforce Heavyweight Grand Prix Finals: Barnett vs. Cormier
